item.title: Narnia Writeup
item.description: Intro BUT FIRST - SPOILER WARNING! Narnia0 –> Narnia1 Narnia1 –> Narnia2 Narnia2 –> Narnia3 Narnia3 –> Narnia4 Narnia4 –> Narnia5 Intro So, I’ve decided to try doing the Narnia wargame, and document my attempts. Let’s get started! BUT FIRST - SPOILER WARNING! Do not read this writeup if you plan to solve Narnia yourself! Narnia0 –> Narnia1 First, we log in: ssh -p 2226 narnia0@narnia.labs.overthewire.org With the password narnia0.
